title: All The King’s Dogs feat. Rory Culkin & Jeremy Sisto
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Jeremy Sisto (Law and Order, FBI) and Rory Culkin (Waco, Halston) co-star in this Hungarian story about two farmers, one wise king, and a whole mess of canines.
